testcase.name: doBizOrderTest

failure.message: Error creating bean with name 'helloBean' defined in class path resource [conf/base-config.xml]: Initialization of bean failed; nested exception is java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Pointcut is not well-formed: expecting 'name pattern' at character position 0 execution(@annotation (monkey.aop.ServiceForCBU) ^
